AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: destination to pick up commercial equipment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer, Texas: location where an immigration checkpoint is situated and a stop occurred, also involved in a search of a tractor-trailer and prolonged stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country of citizenship and location where aliens were transported
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court that handles motions to continue and grants extensions for pretrial motions, also involved in speedy trial cases and reviews of non-excludable days, and holds hearings on suppression motions and motions to dismiss, makes findings regarding the ends of justice for granting continuances
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Supreme Court: recognized the constitutionality of suspicionless routine vehicle stops at immigration checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court record: record of the case where ends-of-justice findings are set forth, includes events that occurred off the record
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.speedy trial case: case where speedy trial determinations are reviewed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: federal law regulating the time between indictment and trial
